# Samples and Tutorials

> Sample code and tutorials for learning .NET, C#, and ASP.NET Core. Includes hands-on examples covering common scenarios and best practices.

*Topics available: 1*

- [.NET samples and tutorials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/samples-and-tutorials/index.md): Information on samples and tutorials for .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, and the C# language that help you learn about .NET.
